name: StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm
name_original: StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm
description:
StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm is a strategy game. It came out on 12-03-2013. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm is available on macOS and PC.
It was scored by Derek Duke, Glenn Stafford, Jason Hayes and Neal Acree.
